message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a generous offer, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
You're starting strong, but I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a chance to reconsider.
You think you're giving me a chance, but I'm not buying it! I'll take a chance to get a better deal.
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're not giving me a good enough deal, Alice. I'll give you a chance to reconsider, but I'm not backing down!
You think I'm being stingy, but I'm just trying to get the best deal I can! I'll keep pushing for more.
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm not going to let you take the lead! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting the upper hand!
I'm not giving up yet, Alice! I'll meet you halfway and see if we can finally come to an agreement.
You're a shrewd negotiator, Bob! I think we've finally found a deal that works for both of us. Let's split the difference and call it a day!
